channel.title: MLOps on Datumorphism
channel.description: Recent content in MLOps on Datumorphism

item.title: Comparison of MLOps Frameworks
item.description: Metaflow Docs A framework for jupyter notebook data scientists. Work locally on notebooks. Python environment management using conda. Work in the cloud with Sagemaker. Tasks Methods Comments Code Scripts/Jupyter Notebook Datastore local + S3 metaflow.S3 Compute local + AWS Batch Metadata metaflow service Metadata specifies flow executions: Flows, Runs, Steps, Tasks, and Artifacts. Scheduling AWS Step Functions Deployment AWS Demo
